title: Personal Identity Logotype
content:
Ok guys I need help for a personal identity. Part of the concept is to show raw type. So here is a logotype Im designing. Its only on stage 1.  
Well this is a weird logotype because its unconventional. Sort of a hybrid bearing serifs for the upper acscender and serif for the lower.

Any help/comments is appreciated very much.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [name.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419065817/http:/typophile.com/files/name.jpg) | 34.61 KB |
author: Prakash Nair

comments.content:
Hi Prakash,  
I think the concept for the face is good. It is a little hard to comment further until the sketch is developed. I would suggest that the s is a little out of character, but I can kind of see where you are going with it. You probably need to keep going with.

Cheers  
Jason.
